control.visible: Control.IsVisible(53) + Container.OnNext + ![[Skin.HasSetting(noflow) + ![Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes)]] | [Skin.HasSetting(noflowtv) + [Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes)]]]
